abstracts.cdata!:
The assistance under the Heavily
            Indebted Poor Countries Debt Initiative Project will support
            the implementation of the government's economic and
            social program. It will provide, in conjunction with other
            creditors, special assistance to allow Burkina Faso to reach
            a sustainable debt position by the completion point. The
            delivery of debt relief will be contingent upon monitorable
            actions, including structural policy actions and social
            programs in both the health and education sectors.
